data.eml:eml: A valid name for the Xishuangbanna gourd, a cucumber with carotene-rich fruits

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Renner, Susanne S. (2017): A valid name for the Xishuangbanna gourd, a cucumber with carotene-rich fruits. PhytoKeys 85: 87-94, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.85.17371, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.85.17371
